		Question: Did Stevie Nicks ever perform solo?
		Answer:
answer: Yes, Stevie Nicks has performed solo. She has released several solo albums, including "Crystal Visions – The Very Best of Stevie Nicks" and has embarked on a three-month tour in support of one of her albums.
